item.title: Roblox: RB World 5 Codes (June 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All RB World 5 Codes
  • How to Redeem RB World 5 Codes
  • How to Get More RB World 5 Codes

RB World 5 offers players a sports simulator experience, where they can play basketball. The game is as close as possible to the original sport, so you will fight in teams of 5 people. And the best thing about it is that you can create a character with a unique playing style, although this requires an investment of resources and time. Therefore, in order to speed up your progress, you need to use RB World 5 codes.

As befits Roblox codes, they grant players various goodies. This includes both currencies and consumables. But of course, their validity is limited.

All RB World 5 Codes

Working RB World 5 Codes

There are no active codes in RB World 5 . We will update this article as soon as more codes become available.

Expired RB World 5 Codes

There are no expired codes in RB World 5 .

RB World 5 has several modes in which you can play both in random teams and with friends. Moreover, players do not have to meticulously create characters at the beginning of the game. Instead, you can choose one of the ready-made ones, with balanced stats and abilities. Despite this, we strongly recommend that you create personal characters later, as this will allow you to use your preferred playstyle. To make it easier for players to do this in the early stages, the developers add codes in RB World 5 .

Roblox codes are a great source of free items, including currencies. They save your time significantly. But we recommend you use them as soon as possible, as they expire over time. If you do not have time to use them during their validity period, the rewards will no longer be available to you.

How to Redeem RB World 5 Codes

Code redemption in RB World 5 works extremely simply, as the feature is no different from most other Roblox experiences. In addition, it does not require any conditions to be met, so you can get the goodies from the first minutes of the game. To do this, follow these simple steps:

  • First, launch RB World 5 .
  • Then, click on the safe icon in the upper right part of the screen.
  • After that, enter the code in the new window.
  • Finally, click Apply to claim the reward.

How to Get More RB World 5 Codes

RB World 5 codes can significantly speed up your progress. However, due to the short period of activity, they must be used immediately after the release. Therefore, we recommend that you visit the official pages of the developers. There you will find all the news about the game, including giveaways and codes:

  • Jokes' Games Roblox group
  • Jokes' Games Discord server
Roblox
338
8.8 /10
Released
September 1, 2006

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

item.title: Roblox: Combat Warriors Kill Sound IDs List (June 2025)
item.description:
Combat Warriors is similar to many other Roblox shooters, but it is especially addictive and fun because of its fast pace. In fact, someone dies here almost every second, so the developers decided to add kill sounds to diversify the gameplay. Roblox players interested in a complete list of Combat Warriors kill sound IDs can find it below.

Updated June 23, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There are two new kill sound IDs added, including fresh laughs and unique melodies to keep your combat experience varied. The collection offers a wide range of sounds, from iconic music to catchy tunes, enhancing your gameplay atmosphere. Keep an eye on updates as new sounds may be added to keep things interesting.

All Combat Warriors Kill Sound IDs (Combat Warriors Codes)

Combat Warriors has recently gained wide popularity, and players have fallen in love with this game because of its action and drive. The developers are eager to support this project and add various maps and new features, including more Kill Sound IDs. This article is constantly updated to provide players with all the latest information. Below, fans can find a list of Kill Sound IDs:

Codes Checked on June 23, 2025.

How to Redeem Kill Shound IDs in Combat Warriors

Redemption of Kill Sound IDs in Combat Warriors is a very simple task. However, if players are still having problems, this step-by-step guide should help to solve them. They should keep in mind though that to unlock the ability to redeem a Kill Sound ID, players will need to pay 199 Robux.

  • Open Roblox and launch Combat Warriors.
  • In the main menu of the game, find the settings.
  • Click on it.
  • Go to the "Audio" tab.
  • Enter the above IDs in the "Kill Sound ID" field.

Combat Warriors Tips and Tricks

To begin with, players need to learn how to move correctly, slide, dash, stomp, and so on, which will lead to success. The next step is to master the combat mechanics. It's not that difficult. Players just need to hit the enemy at the right moment. Completing daily quests is also a key to success, as these quests offer in-game currency with which players can buy new weapons.

Best Roblox Fighting Games Like Combat Warriors

One of the best things about Roblox is the huge variety of games on offer. This bodes well for those who are starting to get bored of their favorite Roblox games, as there are usually plenty of great alternatives just waiting to be discovered. Below, players can learn about the five best Roblox games like Combat Warriors :

  • Project Slayers
  • A One Piece Game
  • Arsenal
  • Dragon Blox
  • Base Battles

About the Combat Warriors Developers

The developers of Combat Warriors never released any other games. But, their group in Roblox already has more than 900K members, and this only indicates the good quality of the project and the hard work of the developers.

item.title: Monster Hunter Wilds Update 2 Content Accidentally Shared Early
item.description:
Monster Hunter Wilds Title Update 2 details have been leaked by Sony itself, providing fans with a fleeting glimpse at the release date, as well as the new content and monsters designed to liven up gameplay. Monster Hunter Wilds was first released back in February 2025, serving as a successor to 2018’s Monster Hunter: World . Wilds offered original features never-before-seen in the franchise thus far, including the addition of cross-platform play support and ever-changing environments to explore.

Unfortunately, nearly four months after its initial release, Monster Hunter Wilds has accumulated ‘Overwhelmingly Negative’ reviews on Steam, targeting a common complaint from players. Still, the upcoming Title Update 2 promises a host of new content that will hopefully return the game to the fandom’s good graces somewhat.

Posted on Reddit by DemonLordDiablos, a list of details was shared on the Gaming Leaks and Rumors subreddit, highlighting new content revealed by Sony on the PlayStation Store’s Monster Hunter Wilds page. The information has since been removed from the store at the time of writing, since the details were supposedly added prematurely, but some of the highlights include confirmation of a June 30 release date, the addition of two “fan-favorite” monsters, the Arch-Tempered Uth Duna, layered weapons, and more events. The leaked news is an exciting tidbit to accompany Capcom’s upcoming summer spotlight event, which is also scheduled to broadcast in June, covering the latest news from the publisher and, hopefully, more Resident Evil Requiem details.

Monster Hunter Wilds Title Update 2 Release Date and Content Confirmed In Premature Sony Post

  • June 30th
  • Two "fan-favorite" monsters
  • Arch-Tempered Uth Duna
  • Layered weapons
  • More events

Redditors were quick to speculate that the two monsters are likely to be Lagiacrus, the leviathan, and Seregios, based on previous datamines. However, the player base was more focused on complaining about the state of the game, rather than the upcoming Title Update 2 content. A common bone of contention among fans is the state of Wilds ’ optimization, with many noting how blurry the graphics are. Despite players’ concerns regarding optimization, Monster Hunter Wilds will include a fan-requested change, which was an addition previously revealed last month.

Looking to the action RPG’s future, Monster Hunter Wilds fans have already made a collaboration wish list that would create exciting crossovers to look forward to. Some of the top contenders that Wilds could unite with include Devil May Cry , Dragon’s Dogma , and Hades , the latter of which could provide a host of unique weapons from Supermassive Games’ roguelike, such as the Stygian Blade and Adamant Rail.

10 Images

item.title: Dice Dreams: Free Rolls For June 2025
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Dice Dreams Links For June 2025
  • How To Redeem Dice Links In Dice Dreams

From attacking opponents and collecting resources to upgrading your kingdom, Dice Dreams is a great option for everyone who enjoys board games with a competitive twist. As the name implies, the core mechanic of Dice Dreams revolves around rolling dice to determine movement and actions on the board.

If you feel like your dice supply is running low, you can use dice links to get free rolls in Dice Dreams . With these free rolls, you can continue rolling the dice to build your kingdom, collect resources, and compete with other players to become the true Dice King.

Updated June 23, 2025, by Usama Ali: In Dice Dreams, every roll brings you closer to building the kingdom of your dreams, but running out of dice can quickly put your adventure on hold. Luckily, the developers frequently release free reward links that offer bonus rolls, coins, and exciting surprises to keep your progress going strong. These links are time-sensitive and can expire without warning, so it’s best to grab them as soon as you can. We update this guide daily with the latest active dice links to help you stay ahead. If you don’t want to let a dice shortage slow you down, make sure to check in every day and keep your kingdom growing.

We didn't find any new links today.

Dice Dreams Links For June 2025

Like most board games, the developers of Dice Dreams regularly introduce dice links for players running low on dice. These links can be helpful in continuing your progress and can be used to redeem various rewards, including rolls and Building Blitz, which can consequently help you build your kingdom. Moreover, these links occasionally reward millions of coins, but most of the time, you'll receive rolls. Below is a list of active links that Dice Dreams players can use to earn some free goodies.

These links are only active for a limited time period, so make sure to redeem them before they expire.

In addition to redeeming rewards from these links, you can earn rolls in Dice Dreams through various other methods. These include regularly participating in events, inviting friends to the game, and taking advantage of in-game promotions and offers. While spending real money is not recommended, you can invite new players or link your Facebook account to get rolls for free.

Expired Dice Dream Links

Like most mobile games, Dice Dreams links expire quickly, usually within a day or so. Recently, there’s been a noticeable shift in the frequency of these link releases, and developers have reduced their quantity. As such, it’s uncertain how long the links will remain active moving forward. For your convenience, here are some expired Dice Dreams links:

How To Redeem Dice Links In Dice Dreams

To redeem a link in Dice Dreams for its reward, you'll first have to click on the links mentioned above. These links will redirect you to another page where you'll see "Get." Click on that, and you'll be redirected to your game, where you'll receive the respective rewards instantly.

You need to have the Dice Dreams app installed before clicking on the link, or else the links and "Get" button will not work.

Make sure to only click on dice links from trustworthy sources to avoid malware or data leakage issues. The links included here have been tried and tested to ensure players don't run into any problems.

item.title: Grow a Garden: Complete Summer Update Guide
item.description:
Roblox 's Grow a Garden has been rolling out updates packed with stellar events and new mechanics like crafting and full garden expansion. Following the Working Bee Swarm update, summer has finally arrived in-game, bringing some of the most exciting items yet.

Now, you won’t just take part in the latest Summer Harvest Event and earn rewards; you’ll also have a chance to grab some returning goodies from past updates, including Easter, Blood Moon, Lunar Glow, and even the Bee Swarm event.

Complete Grow a Garden Summer Update Guide

Here’s a quick rundown of all the content in Grow a Garden ’s Summer Update:

Summer Harvest Event Overview

Firstly, players can join the Summer Harvest Event. In this one, all you need to do is gather tons of new summer fruits and wait for the Summer Harvest weather to spawn, which happens every hour. Once it does, hop onto the event platform and start submitting your fruits into the harvest box.

The best part is that you can also team up with friends if you want. The more fruits you all give away, the more harvest points you earn. After the 10-minute weather ends , you’ll automatically receive rewards based on your total points. Keep at it every hour to unlock everything the event has to offer.

All Summer Crops

Next up, Sam, the owner of the Seed Shop, has packed his bags and gone on vacation. Taking his place is Tom, who’s brought in a whole new stock of summer crops for you to grow. These crops are key to completing the Summer Harvest Event. Some fruits are also available through the Summer Seed Pack. Here’s a list of all the summer fruits in Grow a Garden :

All Summer Fruits

All Summer Harvest Event Rewards

If you, either solo or with other players, manage to rack up enough points, you might receive the following prizes. Keep in mind, not all rewards are guaranteed; rarer ones have a lower drop chance than the rest.

Summer Harvest Rewards

Harvest Points Required

Watering Can

10

100

New Weathers and Mutations

The 1.11.0 update also introduced four new weather types: Heatwave, Gale, Windy, and Tornado , along with five new mutations, which are listed below:

All Summer Update Mutations

Multiplier

1. Sundried

85x

2. Paradisal

18x

3. Twisted

5x

4. Verdant

4x

5. Windstruck

2x

Summer Update Pets

You’ll also get to hatch three Summer Eggs, letting you collect 13 critters that are quite useful. Some of them, like the Seal and Mimic Octopus, are ones you don’t want to miss, since they can get you eggs and even mimic the traits of other pets.

All Summer Pets

Rarities

Eggs

  • Starfish
  • Seagull
  • Crab

Common

Common Summer Egg

  • Flamingo
  • Toucan
  • Sea Turtle
  • Orangutan
  • Seal

Rare

Rare Summer Egg

  • Scarlet Macaw
  • Ostrich
  • Peacock
  • Capybara

Legendary

Paradise Egg

Mimic Octopus

Mythical

Paradise Egg

If you'd like to learn what each of these pets do, you can check out our full pets guide or even read through the best pets tier list for a detailed overview of which ones are worth keeping on your farmland.

Summer Cosmetics and Tools

Since summer wouldn’t be complete without themed decor, Grow a Garden offers over 20 Summer Cosmetics. You can buy them from the Game Shop and Cosmetic Shop or unlock them through the Summer Fun Crate. Moreover, you can craft tools like the Reclaimer, which gives you seeds when removing plants, or you can pick up items like the Tanning Mirror from the Gear Shop that redirects sunlight, allowing you to get the Sundried mutation.
